segments.text: I feel so bad for the woman, she has no idea what’s going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying dishes while the sink overflows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just exhausted or really that focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and she won’t even know until it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, and it’s all going to end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon and sees what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just so sad to watch, knowing she’s about to be in for a big surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn her, but I know she wouldn’t hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene just makes me feel sorry for her.
segments.speaker: PAR
